title: [Update: Finally available] You can uninstall Chrome web apps just like a native Windows app
content:
Google Chrome makes it pretty easy to install Progressive Web Apps or, PWAs, on your machine to where they feel like native apps. Soon, on Windows machines, you’ll be able to uninstall web apps from Chrome just like you can native apps.

more…

The post [Update: Finally available] You can uninstall Chrome web apps just like a native Windows app appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: In a future update, Google Chrome will allow users to uninstall a web app directly from the Windows menu, just as you would a native app.
